Boss of Scrapper level Pit #9.
[[Spirit of Fire|Next #10]].
name: Spirit of Water
strategy:
Treat it like a strong water elemental. For all vocations it is wise to use a [[Helmet of the Deep]] since this will block the drown damage.
'''Mages''': Run around using an energy wand/death rod shooting energy strike. Heal often. Without [[Helmet of the Deep]], use [[Magic Shield]] and kill with [[SD]] as fast as you can, or you will be dead very quickly.
'''Knights''': Melee and [[Exori]] trying to keep your HP constantly full.
'''Paladins''': Use a Shield and [[Ethereal Spear]], bring plenty [[Ultimate Healing Rune|UH]]s.
